## ChatAnalyticsService interface

A service for reporting chat analytics events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ChatAnalyticsService 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [report(event)](./analytics.chatanalyticsservice.report.md) | Reports an analytics event. Will perform a promise rejection if the API response contains an error. |
